title: Thiki Thiki Vandhu Lyrics - Nagaram song lyrics
stanzas:
Singers:  Ranjith, Megha
Movie :  Nagaram
Song   :   Thiki Thiki
Lyrics : Vairamuthu

Thiki Thiki vandhu nillamale
Adi vetkapattu nagam thinamale
Oru kattai-viral kolam podamale
Adi sattendru sonnai un kadhalai

Oru varthayil manne manne
pala vaakiyam sonnai
Un parvai ennai paithiyam seiyudhadi
Un varthai vandhu vaithiyam seiyudhadi

Edhiparkave illai illai
idhayam vazhi sendrai
Un aasai pechu nenjai killudhadi
En aanmai ippo naanam kolludhadi

[Nee sattendru sonnai kadhalai ennaku
Rekkai mulaithadhadi
Manam vinnai kadandhu vinmeenai kadandhu
Engo parakuthadi] (2)
Adiyaeee Adiyaee...

Chennai-yil parakum pattam ellam
Un peyar ezhudhatuma (2)
Nan central station gopuram eri
un peyar kovatuma
Karaigalai modhum azhaigalai azhaithu
kadhalai sollatuma
Un kaaladi akdandha manalgalai alli
Mootayil allatuma

Kadal niram marum, Udal niram marum
Kadhal anbu maradhama maradhama

Nee sattendru sonnai kadhalai ennaku
Rekkai mulaithadhadi
Manam vinnai kadandhu vinmeenai kadandhu
Engo parakuthadi

Paasam kaniyum paarvai ondre
Pavam thanikumadi(2)
Un koondhal malligai vesi erindhal
Koovam manakumadi
Yaaro ezhudhiya kavidhai sonnai
Jeevan innikumbadi
Naanum unnaku kavidhai solven
Eedu kodukkumbadi

Sugam peravendum, Oruvaram vendum
Naan manmadhan aagumbadi aagumbadi
